introParagraph:
We are a Christian Charity based in Douglas in the Isle of man, but we work all over the island. We are here to help people who are in insecure accomodation and those affected by homelessness. Graih offers a range of services including a **Drop-In centre**, **Community Support** and an **Emergency Night Shelter**.

Graih adopts a non-judgemental approach to addressing homelessness issues. We believe in a person centred approach, supporting individuals from 18 years of age up building on peoples strengths and potential. We try to respond to individuals with compassion, kindness and support putting dignity and respect at the centre of all we do.

As well as our support work, we also act as a voice for change on the Island, working with others around transformation in the areas of homlessness and housing.

**Please note** - If you are in crisis, please contact the Crisis Response Team on: +44 1624 642860 - this service operates 7 days a week 24 hours a day

if you need the Emergency Services, please call 999.
